title: Che Guevara Talks to Young People By Ernesto Guevara (Abee)
description:
Che Guevara Talks To Young People By Ernesto Che Guevara, Mary-Alice Waters (Abee)
__
 <a href="
http://cdn.piczend.com/images/gyG2jlix/1383321053_cover.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">

About:
__

A Pathfinder upgraded edition. In eight talks from 1959 to 1964, the Argentine-born revolutionary challenges youth of Cuba and the world to study, to work, to become disciplined. To join the front lines of struggles, small and large. To politicize their organizations and themselves. To become a different kind of human being as they strive together with working people of all lands to transform the world. And, along this course, to revel in the spontaneity and joy of being young.

Introduction by Mary-Alice Waters, 12-page photo section and other photos, glossary, index. Now with enlarged type.

Paperback: 188 pages
Publisher: Pathfinder Press (NY); 1 edition (March 1, 2002)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 087348911X
ISBN-13: 978-0873489119
